text: Vis synt þa land gemæro æt langanforda þara þreora hida.
Þæt is ærest of þam stapole þe sten on mere dune on þære dic west andlang dic oþ hunan weg.
And þar norþ ofer herpaþ andlang hlinc ræwe þwyres ofer botescumb.
And swa forþ andlang hlinc ræwe oþ þone herpaþ.
Þonne andlang herpaþes oþ þære foryrþe upende.
Þonne adune be þare foryrþe westeage oþ hit cymþ to þære dic.
Of þære dic on wilig oð midne stream andlang streames adune oð hit cymþ rihte ongea þa forhyrde middewearde.
Þonne bufan wege andlang west Cumbes betweah þa twa yrh mearca.
To greatan hlince of greatan hlinces ende on healdan weg.
Andlang heldan weges on þane pyt of þam pytte ofer smalandene up on meredune oþ ðone pyt.
Of þam pytte to þam stapule þær hit ær onfeng.
And swa mæd gemæne swa heo ær wæs.
